issue.title: [Python] Rename InMemoryOutputStream to BufferOutputStream
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-961](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-961). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Having this name difference does not seem especially helpful. We can maintain the existing name as an alias for the duration of 1 release.

comments.body:
